author: werken
msg: -- Hooked driver.jelly back into the execution before plugin
loading, so we have a place to update-pom, verify-project,

author: jstrachan
msg: ensured that the images and style directories are created; sometimes CVS prunes these directories which can sometimes cause builds to fail.

author: jstrachan
msg: added maven:jar-resources dependency so that unit testing works properly

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the -g option so that non-described goals are also output.
Also the goals are now sorted as they are output to make it easier to find things
Minor patch applied so that local maven.xml documents can use relative URIs and will find project-local resources.
for example in a local maven.xml you can invoke Jelly scripts via
which will resolve to a local "src/foo.jelly" script in your project local files.
